data.name: Truck Driver - German Paint Jobs DLC
data.detailed_description:
About German Paint Jobs DLC

Drive around Truck Driver and represent your love for Germany with paint jobs of the Berlin skyline, Oktoberfest and the Black Eagle among others.
All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes:

  • German flag 
  • German Black Eagle 
  • Berlin skyline 
  • Oktoberfest 
  • Brandenburg Gate 
  • Neuschwanstein Castle
data.about_the_game:
About German Paint Jobs DLC

Drive around Truck Driver and represent your love for Germany with paint jobs of the Berlin skyline, Oktoberfest and the Black Eagle among others.
All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes:

  • German flag 
  • German Black Eagle 
  • Berlin skyline 
  • Oktoberfest 
  • Brandenburg Gate 
  • Neuschwanstein Castle
data.short_description: Customize your truck in typical German style. Switch it up between six unique paint jobs that give a glimpse into the German culture.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2,6Ghz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 3800+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4th Gen / AMD A10 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
